response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item comes with unparalleled features and benefits designed to enhance your experience significantly. Given its unique value proposition, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $18,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate, considering its market value and the benefits it offers. We believe this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency, performance, and satisfaction. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 18000}
